Title: BAN International pays out N476m to families of deceased members
Summary: Brothers Across Nigeria (BAN) International has given N476 million to 28 families of deceased members . Each family receives over N17 million . The global President of the global President, Dr. Anthony Mark, made this known .

Title: FAAN launches cashless payment system across airports
Summary: Federal Airports Authority of Nigeria (FAAN) launches cashless payment system across airports . FAAN in partnership with Paystack, is proud to announce the roll out of OPERATION GO CASHLESS, a cashless contactless payment solution .

Title: Zamfara not celebrating Independence Day – Govt
Summary: Zamfara State was created in 1996 but has never celebrated Nigeria’s Independence Day . Questions have been raised as to why the State has not been celebrating Independence Day, even though the State is part of Nigeria .

Title: Is religion enough to break a bond? Sola Allyson, Lateef Adedimeji answer
Summary: Gospel singer Sola Allyson pulled Nollywood star Lateef Adedimeji on stage at her Lagos concert . They were clapping for something bigger, a friendship that refuses to be boxed in by religion .

Title: Gateway Airport: Value Jet starts passenger flights on October 7
Summary: Value Jet Airlines scheduled to begin two flights per week on Tuesdays and Thursdays at the Gateway International Airport (GWI), Ogun State, beginning Thursday, October 7 . This follows the green light given to the state-of-the-art airport by regulatory agencies .

Title: Kebbe LG Chairman, Abdullahi Yarima, dies in Sokoto
Summary: Hon. Yarima breathed his last on Friday at the Usmanu Danfodiyo University Teaching Hospital, Sokoto, after a protracted illness .

Title: Customs engages manufacturers on suspended 4% FOB import charge
Summary: Adeniyi explained that although the charge is backed by the Nigeria Customs Service Act 2023, its enforcement must be guided by broad-based consultations with stakeholders .

Title: Breaking: Court gives NMA 8 days to confirm Nnamdi Kanu’s health status
Summary: Justice Omotosho ordered the medical team to visit the medical facility of the DSS to confirm if it has the capacity to meet Kanu's health needs . NMA has 8 days to confirm Nnamdi Kanu’s health status .

Title: Why we oppose Nnamdi Kanu’s transfer to national hospital, FG tells court
Summary: Government faulted a medical report that was issued by private physicians that Kanu engaged to assess the condition of his health . The government faulted the medical report .

Title: Sultan, Alaafin, Soun arrive Ibadan for Olubadan’s coronation
Summary: The Sultan of Sokoto, Alhaji Muhammadu Sa’ad Abubakar III, was among the high-profile figures who arrived in the city for the ceremony . The Sultan, Alaafin, Soun arrive Ibadan for Olubadan's coronation .
